article:
If you have a seven-colour flower, which colour do you want from the petals ? We _ some students and here are some of the answers.
"I want the _ one. I love grapes very much. I hope the purple one can bring  _ lots of grapes. Maybe it can make a grape house for me." Sun Yu _ .
"I think blue is my lucky  _ ,"Wu Chen says, " I love blue. My grandma is a kind _ . When I come back home from school, she always brings me nice food to eat. I hope this blue petal can bring _ luck to her."
"I _ the yellow one." answers Paul. "I hope this one can help my sister Lily. Lily is a 3-year-old girl. But she always stays at home and doesn't talk to others. I hope this yellow petal can make her _ ."
